thread.section_title: Hilton Garden Inn Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent hotel
thread.title_full: Excellent hotel - Review of Hilton Garden Inn Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Guy R
title: Excellent hotel
text: Very good hotel, location is good for those visiting the city for vacation or work. Right by times Square, close to many public transportation and walking distance from the square, central park and the nice places to see. Rooms are very large and beds are comfortable, I would like different pillows but I guess it's just me. Staff are uber friendly and helpful, had a problem with my reservation recovered an email from Brian the duty manager who even called to make sure all is OK and I'm still arriving. All in all very recommended
